# Missing values

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```


## Load data and replace \N with NA
```{r}
basic <- read_tsv("data/title.basics.tsv.gz")
basic$directors <- gsub("\\N", NA, basic$directors, fix=TRUE)
basic$writers <- gsub("\\N", NA, basic$writers, fix=TRUE)
colSums(is.na(basic)) %>%
  sort(decreasing = TRUE)
rowSums(is.na(basic)) %>%
  sort(decreasing = TRUE)
```


## Show the graph of missing data
```{r}
source("scripts/visna.R")
visna(basic)
```
